content:
In the south, the forces of defense destroyed the complex of electronic wrestling, the automatic grenade launcher "Flame" and more than 40 units of enemy equipment.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

"The defense forces continue to cause fire damage to the locations of the enemy, firing positions and rear," the message said.

During the day, the defenders eliminated 137 invaders, 11 guns, including the self-propelled howitzer of the MSTU, mortar, anti-tank rocket complex and 21 units of autobrobronetics.

LANCET, 2 Supercam reconnaissance UAVs, 3 antenna systems and 3 video surveillance cameras were also destroyed.

As reported by the Armyinform, the total losses of the Russian Federation per daymake up750 invaders, 16 BBM and 26 artismen.
title: The Armed Forces in the south destroyed the Flame grenade launcher and the TPP station of the occupiers
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. “Defense forces are further inflicted ...
author: Army Inform
